org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractModel<Options,IsDefaultOptions>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultOptions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalOptions, ScaledOptions

    public class Options
extends AbstractModel<Options,IsDefaultOptions>
implements IsDefaultOptions
    Base object which maps chart options.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates the object only with default provider and native object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Options

        protected Options(IsDefaultOptions defaultValues)
        Creates the object only with default provider. This is used as the root element.
        New native java script object is created and it's empty.
        Parameters:
        defaultValues - default provider instance.

      • Options

        protected Options(IsDefaultOptions defaultValues,
                  NativeObject nativeObject)
        Creates the object only with default provider and native object. This is used as the root element.
        Parameters:
        defaultValues - default provider instance.
        nativeObject - native object to store properties.

      • setAspectRatio

        public void setAspectRatio(double ratio)
        Canvas aspect ratio (i.e. width / height, a value of 1 representing a square canvas).
        Note that this option is ignored if the height is explicitly defined either as attribute or via the style.
        Parameters:
        ratio - the aspect ratio.

      • getAspectRatio

        public double getAspectRatio()
        Canvas aspect ratio (i.e. width / height, a value of 1 representing a square canvas).
        Note that this option is ignored if the height is explicitly defined either as attribute or via the style.
        Specified by:
        getAspectRatio in interface IsDefaultOptions
        Returns:
        the aspect ratio.

      • setDevicePixelRatio

        public void setDevicePixelRatio(double ratio)
        The chart's canvas will use a 1:1 pixel ratio, unless the physical display has a higher pixel ratio (e.g. Retina displays). Setting devicePixelRatio to a value other than 1 will force the canvas size to be scaled by that amount.
        Parameters:
        ratio - the pixel ratio.

      • getDevicePixelRatio

        public double getDevicePixelRatio()
        The chart's canvas will use a 1:1 pixel ratio, unless the physical display has a higher pixel ratio (e.g. Retina displays). Setting devicePixelRatio to a value other than 1 will force the canvas size to be scaled by that amount. Returns the pixel ratio.
        Specified by:
        getDevicePixelRatio in interface IsDefaultOptions
        Returns:
        the pixel ratio.

      • setDefaultColor

        public void setDefaultColor(IsColor defaultColor)
        Sets the default color to use in the chart, on all objects, if not override by the specific configuration.
        Parameters:
        defaultColor - color to use into chart.

      • setDefaultFontStyle

        public void setDefaultFontStyle(FontStyle fontStyle)
        Sets the font style to use in the chart, on all objects, if not override by the specific configuration, follows CSS font-style options (i.e. normal, italic, oblique, initial, inherit).
        Parameters:
        fontStyle - font style to use in the chart, on all objects, if not override by the specific configuration, follows CSS font-style options (i.e. normal, italic, oblique, initial, inherit).

      • getDefaultFontStyle

        Specified by:
        getDefaultFontStyle in interface IsDefaultOptions
        Returns:
        the font style to use in the chart, on all objects, if not override by the specific configuration, follows CSS font-style options (i.e. normal, italic, oblique, initial, inherit).
